summary: New sounds for firing a bow.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/QtD7v94.png[/img][/url][/center]

Hello everybody! This mod simply adds a replacement for the default sound of firing a bow. I don't mind the original but I always wanted one that sounded a bit twangier, hence the title. Since I couldn't find one that sounded the way I [i]envisioned[/i], I put this one together quickly. I'll post it here for anybody who would like to use it as well.

Here's a comparison/preview thingamajig. Keep in mind I am not planning on making any changes, so take it or leave it. [b][i]THIS IS ONLY THE BOW, NOT THE CROSSBOW.[/i][/b]

[youtube]YB0Q558NXXc[/youtube]

The source sound was made by [url=https://www.freesound.org/people/Erdie/sounds/65733/]Erdie[/url]. Preview image on the mod page courtesy of [url=http://www.123rf.com/photo_3306222_old-bow-arrows.html]123rf[/url], and the one on the video is from [url=http://www.gettyimages.com/detail/photo/archers-bow-arrows-and-glove-close-up-high-res-stock-photography/AG9019-001]Getty[/url].

To install, place the files in your 'Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim/Data' folder.

Enjoy!


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
author: Jokerine
